description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Peanut Butter & Chocolate Cookies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cookie,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Video,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Microwave,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Chocolate,Picnic
name: Gluten-Free Peanut Butter & Chocolate Cookies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 375g Free From Gluten buttermilk pancake mix

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 170C and line two baking trays with baking paper. Add chocolate and butter to a medium-sized microwave safe bowl, and microwave on high for two minutes, stirring halfway, until melted.
Transfer pancake mix to a large bowl, then add chocolate mix, cocoa powder and eggs. Mix until thoroughly combined. Allow to cool in the fridge for 20 minutes, or until slightly firm.

With clean hands, roll approximately one tablespoon of cookie mixture into a ball, then place on tray and push down to flatten. Top with a teaspoon of peanut butter, then cover with approximately one tablespoon of cookie mixture and press down to enclose the peanut butter. Repeat to use remaining mixture, leaving approximately 3cm between cookies to allow for spreading. Bake for 15 minutes, then allow to cool on trays for five minutes before serving.
